values.help: Set the delay time for turning associated devices OFF based on status change of your Contact Sensor, in seconds.  0 is default, which is instant.
values.label: Trigger Delay

values.help: You can choose if your Contact Sensor turns an associated device on or off when sending the basic command set.  Value of 0 will set the associated device OFF and value 255 to turn it on.  Value between 1 and 99 will be a percentage of light.  Value between 100-254 are invalid.
values.label: Trigger Action
